attributes.action: illegal to sell property to any one without a money background check (illegal)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) declaration of third party money(property) in all transactions,from Britain or abroad,including bank and at all business levels,(property investment,leese holding, transfers,including charity holdings)clarification of all business money transactions were money is coming from multi-divided souce (all must be declared to the tax and revenue offices).
 non declared money(property) becomes the property of the government. 

2) background checks on all money transfers(property) inside and outside the EU.
all non proved money or property transfers become the auto matic property of the state(government).

3) the names (including all details of business and criminal history)of all souce money must be declared at the begining of any business transaction.
in the earliest stage possible.
notificatio given in written form to the revenue services.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
